net: mvneta: Fix an out of bounds check

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.159 by commit 6b03e41767c7125d36c2fc4b59dd3ccc5da0738e, it was introduced in version v5.10.159 by commit 146ebee8fcdb349d7ec0e49915e6cdafb92544ae. For more details please see the references link.
summary: net: mvneta: Fix an out of bounds check
